did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University Library Acquisitions Department records, 1874-1988.
did.physdesc: Correspondence, accession volumes, fund books, and a catalog.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Records of the Acquisitions Department. include correspondence of Felix Reichmann and Arthur Sweet; miscellaneous correspondence; general correspondence and fund books (1898-1948); accession volumes (1874-1948); Chemistry Library accession books (7 vols., 1927-1962); Latin Seminary accession book, (1892-1914); catalog of the Franz Bopp collection; correspondence with vendors, 1985-1986.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Records of the Acquisitions Department include correspondence of Felix Reichmann and Arthur Sweet; miscellaneous correspondence; general correspondence and fund books (1898-1948); accession volumes (1874-1948); Chemistry Library accession books (7 vols., 1927-1962); Latin Seminary accession book, (1892-1914); catalog of the Franz Bopp collection; correspondence with vendors, 1985-1986.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University Library Acquisitions Department records, #13-3-705. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: See also Cornell University Libraries Acquisitions Department Records, #13-3-1086.
